name: Breast Cancer: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy with Surgery
description: Pathway for the Early Stage HER2+ Breast Cancer Pathway for neoadjuvant chemotherapy with surgery.

criteria.cql: "Primary Cancer Condition" PrimaryCancer return Tuple{ value: PrimaryCancer.code.text.value, match: PrimaryCancer.code.text.value ~ 'Malignant neoplasm of breast (disorder)' }
[Observation: "HER2 [Presence] in Breast cancer specimen by Immune stain"] Her2 return Tuple{ value: Her2.value.text.value, match: Her2.value.text.value ~ 'Positive' }

condition.cql: [Observation: "Primary tumor.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] TLarge let TLageConcept: ToConcept(TLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where TLageConcept ~ "T3 category (finding)" or TLageConcept ~ "T4 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: TLarge.id.value , status: TLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Primary tumor.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] TLarge let TLageConcept: ToConcept(TLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where TLageConcept ~ "T3 category (finding)" or TLageConcept ~ "T4 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: TLarge.id.value , status: TLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Primary tumor.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] TLarge let TLageConcept: ToConcept(TLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where TLageConcept ~ "T3 category (finding)" or TLageConcept ~ "T4 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: TLarge.id.value , status: TLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Primary tumor.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] TSmall where ToConcept(TSmall.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "T0 category (finding)" or ToConcept(TSmall.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "T1 category (finding)" or ToConcept(TSmall.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "T2 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: TSmall.id.value , status: TSmall.status.value}

[Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] NLarge let NLargeConcept: ToConcept(NLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where NLargeConcept ~ "N1 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N2 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N3 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: NLarge.id.value , status: NLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] NLarge let NLargeConcept: ToConcept(NLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where NLargeConcept ~ "N1 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N2 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N3 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: NLarge.id.value , status: NLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] NLarge let NLargeConcept: ToConcept(NLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where NLargeConcept ~ "N1 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N2 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N3 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: NLarge.id.value , status: NLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] N0 where ToConcept(N0.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "N0 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: N0.id.value , status: N0.status.value}

Surgery1.label: Surgery
Surgery1.cql: if exists [Procedure: "Lumpectomy of breast (procedure) code"] then [Procedure: "Lumpectomy of breast (procedure) code"] Lumpectomy return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Procedure', id: Lumpectomy.id.value, status: Lumpectomy.status.value } else [ServiceRequest: "Lumpectomy of breast (procedure) code"] Request return Tuple{ resourceType: 'ServiceRequest', id: Request.id.value, status: Request.status.value }

PaclitaxelTrastuzumab.label: Paclitaxel and Trastuzumab
PaclitaxelTrastuzumab.cql: [MedicationRequest: "paclitaxel 100 MG Injection"] MR return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: MR.id.value , status: MR.status.value}

ChemotherapyTCHP.label: Chemotherapy TCHP
ChemotherapyTCHP.cql: [CarePlan] TCHP where TCHP.title.value='ChemoTCHP' return Tuple{ resourceType: 'CarePlan', id: TCHP.id.value , status: TCHP.status.value}

ChemotherapyACTHP.label: Chemotherapy ACTHP
ChemotherapyACTHP.cql: [CarePlan] ACTHP where ACTHP.title.value='ChemoACTHP' return Tuple{ resourceType: 'CarePlan', id: ACTHP.id.value , status: ACTHP.status.value}

ChemotherapyddACTHP.label: Chemotherapy ddACTHP
ChemotherapyddACTHP.cql: [CarePlan] CTHP where CTHP.title.value='ChemoddACTHP' return Tuple{ resourceType: 'CarePlan', id: CTHP.id.value , status: CTHP.status.value}

Surgery2.label: Surgery
Surgery2.cql: if exists [Procedure: "Lumpectomy of breast (procedure) code"] then [Procedure: "Lumpectomy of breast (procedure) code"] Lumpectomy return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Procedure', id: Lumpectomy.id.value, status: Lumpectomy.status.value } else [ServiceRequest: "Lumpectomy of breast (procedure) code"] Request return Tuple{ resourceType: 'ServiceRequest', id: Request.id.value, status: Request.status.value }

condition.cql: [Observation "Pathologic response code"] Response where ToConcept(Response.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Complete" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: Response.id.value, status: Response.status.value}

[Observation "Pathologic response code"] Response let ResponseConcept: ToConcept(Response.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where ResponseConcept ~ "Partial" or ResponseConcept ~ "Stable" or ResponseConcept ~ "Progressive" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: Response.id.value, status: Response.status.value}

AdotrastuzumabEmtansine.label: Ado-trastuzumab Emtansine
AdotrastuzumabEmtansine.cql: [MedicationRequest: "ado-trastuzumab emtansine 100 MG Injection"] MR return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: MR.id.value , status: MR.status.value}

condition.cql: [Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] N0 where ToConcept(N0.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "N0 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: N0.id.value , status: N0.status.value}

[Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] NLarge let NLargeConcept: ToConcept(NLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where NLargeConcept ~ "N1 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N2 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N3 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: NLarge.id.value , status: NLarge.status.value}

Trastuzumab.label: Trastuzumab
Trastuzumab.cql: [MedicationRequest: "trastuzumab 150 MG Injection code"] MR return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: MR.id.value , status: MR.status.value}

PertuzumabTrastuzumab.label: Pertuzumab and Trastuzumab
PertuzumabTrastuzumab.cql: [MedicationRequest: "14 ML pertuzumab 30 MG/ML Injection"] MR return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: MR.id.value , status: MR.status.value}
